game.name: StateOS: The Political Sandbox
game.categories: Single-player, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The political sandbox game where you build a career from the city council to the presidency. Authentic electoral systems, government departments, pass legislation, and a unique news landscape. Create custom scenarios, parties, and politicians in this data-driven democracy simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The political sandbox game where you build a career from the city council to the presidency. Authentic electoral systems, government departments, pass legislation, and a unique news landscape. Create custom scenarios, parties, and politicians in this data-driven democracy simulator.
